title: Global confidence in the US president jumped 58 points from Trump to Biden in a dozen major countries
content:
1. Global confidence in the US president jumped 58 points from Trump to Biden in a dozen major countries  Business Insider
  2. Global approval of the United States has rebounded under Biden, survey finds  The Washington Post
  3. President Biden Abroad Live Updates: G7 and Vaccine Donation Plan News  The New York Times
  4. Why does Joe Biden feel the need to tell people in other countries what to do, even when he can't get Americans to obey him?  RT
  5. Biden Repairing Trump's Damage, Anti-Vaxxers Spreading Garbage Disinformation & Cicadas!  Jimmy Kimmel Live
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Global confidence in the US president jumped 58 points from Trump to Biden in a dozen major countries  Business Insider

Why does Joe Biden feel the need to tell people in other countries what to do, even when he can't get Americans to obey him?  RT

localize.title: 米国大統領に対する世界の信頼度は、主要12カ国でトランプからバイデンまで58ポイント上昇
在十几个主要国家中，从特朗普到拜登，全球对美国总统的信心跃升了58点
在十幾個主要國家中，從特朗普到拜登，全球對美國總統的信心躍升了58點
